# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity generation structure at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group at position (x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position (x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before operation.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients for operation.
- Regularly check the ingredient status of entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
- Regularly check the connection status of entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to empty pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are filled with the necessary fluids for operation.
- Regularly check the fluid status of pipe groups to prevent downtime.

### Errors due to waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient source of items for operation.
- Regularly check the source status of entities to prevent downtime.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
